name: BOXORT
description:
BOXORT is a small arcade game in which you have to help the warehouse workers to sort all the incoming boxes on the conveyor belt.

Easy controls :
• Touch a box.
• Slide it toward the matching color side.

The game is free, with a banner ad in menus and a fullscreen ad every 3 games. But no ad is displayed during gameplay. You can buy the ad remover ingame for less than a buck.
